snippet: Experts know the percentage plays of numerous suit combinations. But occasionally the bidding suggests that the normal line will not work. Then some improvisation is required.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column on a deal played during a duplicate at Honors Bridge Club in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: Experts know the percentage plays of numerous suit combinations. But occasionally the bidding suggests that the normal line will not work. Then some improvisation is required.

headline.seo: Bridge - Sly Improvisation at Honors Club in Manhattan
headline.main: Sly Improvisation at Honors Club in Manhattan
